item.title: 2025-08-09 â€“ Blender AI Conclusion
item.description:
ðŸ› ï¸ Introduction

Iâ€™m exploring ways to model my ideas for a CNC machine.

In a previous blog I experimented with AI and Blender to create an aluminium frame.
I chose Blender because AI could generate Python scripts for it.

During my research, I discovered that FreeCAD also supports Python scripting.
Although Blender can be used for CAD-like tasks and 3D design, I think FreeCAD might be a better fit for my next steps.

For additional Blender inspiration, I also found this ðŸ“ Rab3D tutorial. Hopefully, the creator will continue updating his progress.
